record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term="Record Display Input command panel" and format.name="rio" and syslanguage="en"
record.recordid: Record Display Input command panel - rio - en
record.format.name: rio

brief.brief: The Record Display/Input command panel displays and conditionally allows input into a record using a specified form.

detail.detail: Record: (file variable) Specify the record variable to display or input.
Format: (character) Specify the name of the form through which to display the record.
Prompting Message: (character) Specify the prompting message.
Condition for Record Input: (Boolean) Specify the condition that must exist if record input is to occur.
If the condition is true, Service Manager allows record input.
If the condition is false, Service Manager does not allow record input;
If this field is empty (NULL), Service Manager does not wait for interrupting key.
Condition for Options: (array of Booleans) Specify the condition that must exist before the option can be used.
Option #: (array of numbers) Specify the number that identifies the option.
Description: (array of characters) Describe what the option does.
Exit: (array of labels) Specify the exit to take if a user selects the option.
The Enter key invokes a normal exit.
If the input fields are blank, the normal exit specifies the next panel.
